column2: The plaintiff has framed  7  issues,  1st defendant 5  issues and
2 nd  defendant 4  issues respectively.  (Vide judgment Page 215).  The
trial  proceeded  thereon.  District Judge  of Matugama in judgment
dated  16.04.1996 dismissed  the  plaintiffs claim as he  had filed  to

adduce  evidence 
in  his 
favor 
to 
invoke 
the  principle  of  laesio
